snippet: The vocal ensemble Tenet and the group of chamber players known as the Sebastians perform “Mark, How Readily Each Pliant String,” composed by Henry Purcell.
abstract: The vocal ensemble Tenet and the group of chamber players known as the Sebastians perform “Mark, How Readily Each Pliant String,” composed by Henry Purcell.

headline.main: In Performance: Tenet and the Sebastians
